Pharmacist Job at Nett Pharmacy Limited




        
    

        
        Nett Pharmacy is a foremost retail pharmacy chain with presence in major cities in Nigeria. At Nett Pharmacy, we provide top-quality and innovative health and beauty products and services that enable our customers to live well and live better. Our main goal is to support our customers and patients through different stages of their lives and enable them to live healthier lives by providing guidance and information to put them in control of their health.

We offer a broad range of product categories from over-the-counter medicines and prescription medications, vitamins and supplements, to medical aids and small diagnostics equipment and a very wide range of skincare products to meet the needs of our esteemed customers. Our vision is to become the leading retail pharmacy, reputable for providing high quality, affordable medications, skincare products and professional services in Nigeria, by leveraging on technology to enhance our supply chain distribution for improved efficiency and grow our footprints both online and physical locations, to bring us closer to our customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Pharmacist

Job Location: Owerri, Imo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Accurately dispense medicines and nutritional supplements, with a good knowledge of drug interactions and contraindications according to the ethics guiding the profession.
	Counsel on medicine use, disease conditions management and preventive methods
	Supervise Health Care Assistants
	Advise patients on over-the-counter medications and general health issues and monitor patient health outcomes and adherence to medications
	Manage the branch’s inventory, including ordering, stocking, and disposing of expired medications and work with the procurement department for effective and efficient drug supply.
	Create awareness of the Pharmacy’s products and services in the community
	Verification of all goods supplied to the branch to ensure authenticity, quality, integrity and expiry date according to the company’s policies and procedures.
	Maintaining an up-to-date customer database, chronic care medication patient list and knowledge of regular customers.
	Provide excellent customer service and build positive relationships with patients
	Handle customer complaints and resolve issues promptly and professionally according to the company’s policy.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@nettpharmacy.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Chief of Operations / Operations Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a strategic, result-oriented, and experienced Operations Manager / Chief of Operations to oversee day-to-day operations, drive sales performance, and ensure organizational excellence.
	The ideal candidate must have a strong background in real estate marketing operations, team leadership, and business strategy execution.
	You will play a key role in managing departments, supervising marketers, and ensuring sales targets and operational standards are consistently achieved.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee daily operations across all departments (Sales, Marketing, Admin, HR, and Client Relations).
	Develop and implement sales and operational strategies that align with company goals.
	Supervise and motivate the sales and marketing teams to achieve consistent monthly and quarterly targets.
	Design performance structures, track KPIs, and enforce accountability within teams.
	Conduct periodic sales meetings, training, and field reviews to boost conversion rates.
	Develop efficient workflow processes that optimize productivity and reduce operational gaps.
	Manage client pipelines, project timelines, and internal communications.
	Collaborate with the CEO and department heads to ensure smooth project execution.
	Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer insights to drive business innovation.
	Prepare and present periodic performance and financial reports to management.
	Ensure compliance with company policies, ethics, and standards of excellence.


Education &amp; Qualifications


	Minimum of B.Sc or HND in Business Administration, Marketing, Estate Management, or related field.
	Master&rsquo;s Degree (MBA) is an advantage.
	Professional certifications in Business Management, Project Management, or Real Estate are added assets.


Experience:


	Minimum of 5&ndash;7 years of proven experience in real estate operations, marketing leadership, or business management.
	Demonstrated success in leading teams to achieve sales targets in the real estate or property sector.
	Strong background in strategy development, process optimization, and performance management.


Required Skills &amp; Competencies:


	Strong leadership, coordination, and communication skills.
	Proven ability to lead a sales-driven team and deliver measurable results.
	Excellent strategic thinking, business analysis, and problem-solving skills.
	Deep understanding of real estate marketing operations, sales funnel management, and client engagement.
	Proficiency in CRM tools, project management, and reporting systems.
	High emotional intelligence and ability to inspire and influence teams.
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills under pressure.


Other Requirements:


	Must reside within Ajah, Sangotedo, Abraham Adesanya, or Lekki-Axis for ease of coordination.
	Must be confident, assertive, and business-oriented.
	Must possess strong leadership presence and team management skills.
	Must be available for field operations, client meetings, and strategy sessions.
	Must have a strong record of leading teams to close high-value real estate deals.


Salary
N200,000 - N400,00 / month.

Remuneration &amp; Benefits:


	Competitive salary package (based on experience).
	Performance-based bonuses and incentives tied to sales and operational KPIs.
	Opportunity for career growth into executive management.
	Exposure to premium clients, properties, and strategic business networks.


Method of Application
